resolution.description: Resolution, which cannot be modified dynamically
resolution.description_zh: 分辨率，不支持动态修改

frameSize.description: Specify the desired camera frame data size
frameSize.description_zh: 指定期望的相机帧数据尺寸

outputDimension.description: The camera takes pictures and records at the resolution.
outputDimension.description_zh: 相机拍照，录制的分辨率。

onStop.description: The camera is triggered when it terminates abnormally, such as when it exits the background
onStop.description_zh: 摄像头在非正常终止时触发，如退出后台等情况

onError.description: Triggered when the user is not allowed to use the camera
onError.description_zh: 用户不允许使用摄像头时触发

onInitDone.description: Triggers when camera initialization is complete
onInitDone.description_zh: 相机初始化完成时触发

onReady.description: Triggers when the camera initialization is successful.
onReady.description_zh: 相机初始化成功时触发。

onScanCode.description: Triggered when a 1D code is successfully recognized, it takes effect only when mode="scanCode" is used
onScanCode.description_zh: 在成功识别到一维码时触发，仅在 mode="scanCode" 时生效
